content.prompt:
Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa / Art Resource, NY

In the work shown, which of the following was used to draw attention to the surface texture of the material?

choices.label: Outlined forms and large areas of negative space
Overlapping shapes that create a background space

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
